entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. High minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
